abstract: Current programming environments for user interface development provide visual programming techniques to aid in using object oriented and component technology concepts. We suggest a clear separation of visualizations for component assembly on the one hand and object oriented programming on the other hand, present metaphors and a programming environment.

authors.name: Ludger Martin
authors.affiliation: Computer Science, Darmstadt University of Technology, Alexanderstr. 10, D-64283 Darmstadt, Germany

authors.name: Elke Siemon
authors.affiliation: Computer Science, Darmstadt University of Technology, Alexanderstr. 10, D-64283 Darmstadt, Germany

title: Component visualization based on programmer's conceptual models (poster session)
